section.para: Follow the following steps to build the homesite:

listitem.para: Install git - http://git-scm.com/ .
Install perl 5.16.x (or later) in case it’s not already installed. You should have a package for it for your system.
Install Website Meta Language (version 2.28.0 or later):
Run and configure CPAN (see - https://perl-begin.org/topics/cpan/ ) and type:
or:
or:
Install Latemp:
See https://web-cpan.shlomifish.org/latemp/ and https://github.com/thewml/latemp .
Add Latemp to the beginning of your path:
Install the latest version of Quad-Pres from:
See https://www.shlomifish.org/quad-pres/ and https://github.com/shlomif/quad-pres
See its INSTALL file. Put a working quadp executable in your shell’s PATH.
Install the wml-affiliations.
listitem.programlisting: git clone https://github.com/shlomif/wml-affiliations trunk cd trunk/wml bash Install.bash

listitem.para: Install the wml-extended-apis:
listitem.programlisting: git clone https://github.com/thewml/wml-extended-apis trunk cd trunk/xhtml/1.x/ bash Install.bash

listitem.para: Install inkscape - version 1.0.x-or-later is recommended, and put its executable in the path.
Install jing and put it in the path:
http://www.thaiopensource.com/relaxng/jing.html
Install Apache FOP and put it in the path:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/
Install optipng and put it in the path
Put the XHTML 1.1 DTDs , the XHTML 1.0 DTDs , etc. in your XML_CATALOG_FILES environment variable.
An easy way to do that is to do:
And set XML_CATALOG_FILES to /etc/xml/catalog $(pwd)/markup-validator/htdocs/sgml-lib/catalog.xml
Do the following to build the site, after all dependencies were installed:
listitem.programlisting: git clone https://github.com/shlomif/shlomi-fish-homepage.git trunk cd trunk ./gen-helpers gmake gmake docbook_extended gmake test
listitem.para: The site’s pages and data files should be in dest/post-incs/t2/ .
